result.execSummary:
The defendant Kethan A. Rood was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Huber granted.
Transfer to Lafayette County authorized.
All court obligations shall be paid directly to Clerk of Court.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kethan A. Rood

records.descr: Order Collection Biological Specimen DNA Analysis

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kethan A. Rood in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Kethan A. Rood. Per agreement, defendant will be pleading to charge. State will recommend 30 days jail, court costs, and DNA. Court reviews plea questionnaire and finds defendant freely and knowingly waives rights. Defendant pleads no contest. Court accepts plea and finds defendant guilty. State heard. Attorney Bartelt heard. Defendant heard. Court heard and orders 15 days jail, huber, can transfer to Lafayette County, to report to jail no later 7-7-22, pay court costs, and provide a DNA.

Defendant Kethan A. Rood in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Kethan A. Rood. Attorney Bartelt requests continued status. State does not object. Court continues status.
Status conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Status conference on June 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Kethan A. Rood appeared in court, Attorney Peter A. Bartelt for Kethan A. Rood appeared by video, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. for State of Wisconsin appeared in court. Defendant waives reading and stands mute. Court enters not guilty plea(s).
Status conference scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on May 11, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Kethan A. Rood appeared in court, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. for State of Wisconsin appeared in court. Defendant contacted SPD this morning. He does qualify for SPD but SPD was unable to have an attorney here for today. Court continues arraignment.
Arraignment scheduled for March 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Kethan A. Rood appeared in court, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Discussed attorney situation with defendant. Recently quit his job and tried calling this morning. Court will withdraw the warrant. Bond remains and was directed to go to the SPD this morning. Court cont. to 3/14/22 at 10:30.
Arraignment scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Defendant Kethan A. Rood not in court, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Warrant authorized on state's request.

Defendant Kethan A. Rood appeared in court, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant looking into retaining an attorney. Admits service and waives further reading. Court reviews charges, penalties and right to counsel with defendant. Sets $500 signature bond.  Arraignment: 2/21/22 at 10:30 am.
